file_results.false_positive_reason: The flagged lines (requests.post and requests.get) are used to obtain authentication tokens from Azure Managed Service Identity (MSI) endpoints and Azure Instance Metadata Service (IMDS). These are standard, documented methods for acquiring tokens in Azure SDKs and do not exfiltrate sensitive data to unauthorized or external endpoints. The endpoints used are either local (localhost) or well-known Azure IPs (169.254.169.254), and the payloads are limited to authentication parameters. There is no evidence of data being sent to arbitrary or attacker-controlled destinations. The code is part of a legitimate Azure authentication library and the flagged behavior is expected and necessary for its function.
